Here's a diverse selection of radio stations from Hungary, catering to various tastes! Whether you're into dance music or prefer news and talk shows, there's something for everyone:

1. **Dance Wave!** - Perfect for fans of club, dance, electronic, house, and trance music. Tune in via [stream](http://stream.dancewave.online:8080/dance.mp3).

2. **Dance Wave Retro!** - Get your fix of 90s dance hits here. Click [here to listen](http://onair.dancewave.online:8080/retrodance.mp3).

3. **RÃ¡diÃ³ 1 - Budapest** - A popular choice in Budapest, known for its variety. Stream it [here](http://icast.connectmedia.hu/5201/live.mp3).

4. **Kossuth RÃ¡diÃ³** - Offers news, public radio, and talk in Hungarian. Available [here](http://mr-stream.mediaconnect.hu/4734/mr1.aac).

5. **Mercy RÃ¡diÃ³ - KabarÃ©** - For a mix of comedy and talk, tune in [here](http://stream.mercyradio.eu/kabare.mp3).

6. **PetÅ‘fi RÃ¡diÃ³** - Features alternative, pop, and public radio content in Hungarian. Listen [here](http://mr-stream.mediaconnect.hu/4737/mr2.aac).

7. **MegaDance RÃ¡diÃ³** - Bringing you a mix of dance music. Available at [this link](http://megadanceradio.hopto.org:8000/livemega.mp3).

8. **Oxygen The 80s Hits** - A haven for 80s classic hits. Stream via [this link](https://oxygenmusic.hu:8443/oxygenthe80shits).

9. **SlÃ¡ger FM** - Enjoy 80s, 90s, and classic hits. Tune in [here](http://92.61.114.159:7812/slagerfm256.mp3).

10. **InforÃ¡diÃ³** - For the latest news and talk shows in Hungarian, listen [here](http://stream.infostart.hu/lejatszo/index.html?sid=1).

Each station offers a unique listening experience, so you might find your new favorite among them!

Here are some jazz radio stations in Hungary you might enjoy:

1. **BartÃ³k RÃ¡diÃ³** - Offers a mix of classical, cultural content, and jazz. It's a part of Duna MÃ©dia, broadcasting in Hungarian. Quality streaming at 320kbps. [Listen here](http://mr-stream.mediaconnect.hu/4742/mr3hq.mp3)

2. **Jazzy** - A dedicated jazz station with a focus on the genre, streaming at 192kbps. A favorite among listeners. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzy/jazzy.mp3)

3. **Tilos RÃ¡diÃ³ 32 kbit/sec** - Known for its eclectic mix, including jazz and rock. It has a low bitrate stream at 32kbps. [Listen here](http://stream.tilos.hu/tilos_32.mp3)

4. **Jazzy Groove** - Offers a blend of groove and smooth jazz, streaming at a clear 192kbps. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzygroove/jazzygroove.mp3)

5. **COOLFM Jazz** - Features jazz and smooth jazz tunes, available at 128kbps. [Stream link](https://mediagw.e-tiger.net/stream/zc13)

6. **Jazzy Soul** - A mix of jazz, smooth jazz, and soul, promising a rich listening experience. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzysoul/jazzysoul.mp3)

7. **Jazzy Cool** - Focusing on jazz and smooth jazz, streaming at 192kbps for a crisp sound. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzycool/jazzycool.mp3)

8. **Jazzradio.hu** - A Hungarian jazz station, offering a diverse playlist. Streams in OGG format. [Listen here](https://www.jazzradio.hu:8000/jazzradio_192.ogg)

9. **MR5 - Parlamenti AdÃ¡sok** - While mainly focusing on news and politics, it also includes jazz in its programming, streaming at 64kbps. [Listen here](https://mr-stream.connectmedia.hu/4746/mr5.mp3)

10. **Diveky-radio-swing** - Dedicated to jazz music, streaming at 128kbps for fans of the genre. [Stream link](http://178.238.223.39:8000/swing)

These stations offer a variety of jazz music, from classic tunes to contemporary beats, catering to different tastes. Enjoy exploring the vibrant jazz scene of Hungary!

Here's a list of radio stations with "BBC" in their name, offering a wide range of content from news and talk to cultural programs in various languages:

1. **BBC World Service** - A global news and talk station broadcasting worldwide in English. It's one of the most renowned sources for international news.
   
2. Another stream of the **BBC World Service** is available, also focusing on news and BBC content in English.

3. **BBC Afrique Radio** - Targeting audiences interested in Africa, this station offers news and talk in both English and French, focusing on African affairs.

4. **BBC Nepali** - Broadcasting in Nepal, this station provides news content in Nepali, catering to the Nepali-speaking audience.

5. **BBC Arabic Radio** - Offers news and talk in Arabic and English, focusing on the Arab world and broader global issues.

6. **BBC Radio 4 (128k)** - Known for its comedy, drama, news, and talk shows, this station is a staple of British radio, broadcasting in English.

7. Another stream of the **BBC World Service** is available, emphasizing news content in English but at a different bitrate.

8. **BBC News HD (720P)** - This is a high-definition news service broadcasting in English, focusing on England, the UK, and international news.

9. A lower bitrate stream of the **BBC World Service** for news content in English, catering to listeners with limited internet bandwidth.

10. **BBC UNHCR** - Broadcasting in Afghanistan, this station focuses on news and content related to the UNHCR's work in the region, in MP3 format at 56kbps.

Each of these stations offers unique content catering to different interests and languages, making the BBC a versatile broadcaster with a global reach.

I found 5 jazz stations from France that you might enjoy:

1. **Jazz Radio Blues** - This station blends jazz with blues and broadcasts in French. It's quite popular, with over 57,000 votes. You can listen to it [here](http://jazzblues.ice.infomaniak.ch/jazzblues-high.mp3).

3. **Jazz Radio Classic Jazz** - For a more classical jazz experience, tune into this station. It's another French-language option with a solid listener base. Listen [here](http://jazz-wr01.ice.infomaniak.ch/jazz-wr01-128.mp3).

5. **ABC Lounge Radio** - Broadcasting in both English and French, this station offers a chill mix of ambient, easy listening, and smooth jazz music. A perfect choice for relaxing. Tune in [here](https://eu1.fastcast4u.com/proxy/kpmxz?mp=/1).

Each of these stations has something unique to offer for jazz lovers, from classic jazz tunes to blends with blues and soul. Enjoy exploring the sounds of jazz from France!
